name: Even a White Rose Casts a Black Shadow
name_original: Even a White Rose Casts a Black Shadow
description:
A Serious game exploring generational trauma and how it is passed on. Made by second year students of Media Design School, New Zealand.

A downloadable interactive story for windows.

Made over two weeks by students at Media Design School, New Zealand.

Simple puzzles and abstract story

3 puzzle types

[MOVEMENT]

WSAD - Move

Mouse - Look

'E' - Interact

L-Click - pickup/drop/move puzzle pieces

- Press Q to skip a puzzle -

- Use alt-f4 to quit -
